version_description:
** Nominated for the UN's World Summit Awards
NEW - The free summaries of Tim Ferriss' favorite book, Vagabonding and The Art of Travel by the founder of The School of Life, Alain de Botton. As always, enjoy and let us know what you think about our cur

* We've added the key ideas of the #1 NY Times bestseller, Designing Your Life by Stanford professors, Bill Burnett and Dave Evans. We also updated Can't Hurt Me by David Goggins. As always, enjoy and let us know what you think about our curation.
* We

* We've added the key ideas of the #1 Wall Street Journal bestseller, The Obstacle is the Way by Ryan Holiday that is recommended by Arnold Schwarzenegger, Tim Ferriss, and Robert Greene. As always, enjoy and let us know what you think about our curation.

* Premium users can now upvote new books by using the "Vote for new books" option under the menu
* We added a feedback survey under the app's menu that we'd love you to take
* You can now upvote and suggest new features from under the app's menu

* You can now play FREE audiobooks or longer talks/interviews from the overflow menu in the book's screens
* We've added the key ideas of Educated, the mega-bestseller by Tara Westover that is recommended by Barack Obama, Bill Gates, and Oprah Winfrey.

* You can now try the premium subscription for free
* We added the key ideas of Unlimited Memory, the Wall Street Journal bestseller of Grandmaster Kevin Horsley. Please rate our curation using the new feedback form under the overflow menu in the book'

* This release includes minor bug fixes and performance improvements
* We added the key ideas of the #1 NYT bestseller, You Are a Badass by Jen Sincero. This book was the most upvoted one by you. Please rate our curation using the new feedback form und

* Check out the new What's New page under the menu to stay in the loop about new or updated storyshots
* We added the key ideas of the timeless leadership and strategy bestseller, The Art of War by Sun Tzu. Please rate our curation using the new feedba

* We fixed a bug that caused premium users to see ads
* We added the key ideas of the timeless leadership and strategy bestseller, The Art of War by Sun Tzu. Please rate our curation using the new feedback form under the menu in the book's screen.

* The app now automatically skips the intro for audiobooks and long audio storyshots
* We fixed a bug that stopped premium users from upvoting new books
* We added the key ideas of the NY Times and WSJ bestseller, The $100 Startup by Chris Guillebea

* The key takeaways of Ramit Sethi's NY Times bestseller, I Will Teach You to Be Rich
* A simple feature that allows you to resume audio storyshots from the main screen
* Book sharing links now use go.getstoryshots.com instead of storyshots.page.lin

* We made it easier to see our NEW and UPDATED books and browse categories. Just use the second icon on the top left on the main screen.
* Use Contribute to StoryShots from under the app's menu to submit your own key ideas or suggest different ones

* We added POPULAR and TIM FERRISS RECOMMENDS categories to the redesigned category section. Use the second icon on the top left on the main screen's top bar to access them.
* We redesigned the bookmarks screen and added two new sections for you to acc

We added
* Ryan Holiday's new #1 NY Times bestseller, Stillness is the Key and the Tim Ferriss-endorsed, The Art of Learning by Josh Waitzkin
* resume support for audiobooks and improved its design
* landscape support for text shots

* Arianna Huffington's #1 NY Times bestseller, Thrive
